name: WeezLabs
description:
At WeezLabs, we put the user first. We develop compelling and functional applications for both startups and enterprises. The ubiquity of mobile devices is empowering users with information while providing a new platform for businesses to engage customers. Our teams are experts in user experience, mobile engagement, and business strategy across all popular platforms.
WeezLabs develops apps that users can't live without for innovative companies who understand that they can't live without mobile.
